conversations.body_text: Hi Joachim Wojak,    We apologize for the delayed response. You may click the link to pay the difference, and we will upgrade your order.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
Thank you. I made the payment.  Regards from Austria

Hi Joachim Wojak,    We have processed the replacement for you.  Additionally, we sincerely apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse were delayed due to road closures caused by severe snowstorms in Europe. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship from China as soon as possible.

No problem, thank you for the update.

service@simsonn.com
Hi Joachim Wojak,    Thank you for your understanding!
